div.p: No. 157, pp. 242-3, unit 60, VPRS 1187/P, outward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office of Victoria

p.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Geneva, Geneva; text-align: end;
font-size: 12pt; font-family: Geneva, Geneva; text-align: end;

div.p: I have the honor to request you will be good enough to furnish as soon as possible a Return, in the form as under

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.5pt solid #000000;

padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: 0.5pt solid #000000;

padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.5pt solid #000000;

padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.5pt solid #000000;

padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border-left: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-right: none; border-top: 0.5pt solid #000000; border-bottom: 0.5pt solid #000000;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: 0.5pt solid #000000;

div.p: of all officers of your Department connected directly or indirectly with the receipt of and disbursement of public moneys who are either under security at the present time or whom it is considered desirable to place under security.

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva, Geneva;

div.p: I have the honor to be

p.style: font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva, Geneva;
font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva, Geneva;
font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-family: Geneva, Geneva;

div.p:
Government Botanist
Circular letter sent to 13 sub-departments.
